LocalizationDataList.ZH_CN: 开局可以先打箱子发育，大量装备和经验他不香吗？
LocalizationDataList.EN: Chests contain EXP and gears, loot them to gain an edge.

LocalizationDataList.ZH_CN: 箱子越华丽，装备越好，经验也越多
LocalizationDataList.EN: More advanced chests contain better gears and more EXP.

LocalizationDataList.ZH_CN: 狙击枪瞄准的时间越长，射程也越长
LocalizationDataList.EN: Daggers can increase your moving speed by 20%.

LocalizationDataList.ZH_CN: 霰弹枪的射程很短，但是近距离时的伤害非常高
LocalizationDataList.EN: Using an axe to attack gives you Super Armor, making your attacks less likely to be interrupted.

LocalizationDataList.ZH_CN: 听说咸蛋超人发动气刃有奇效
LocalizationDataList.EN: Air Blade is a perfect skill for Ultiman.

LocalizationDataList.ZH_CN: 据说水管工都特别喜欢破坏砖头，对吧？
LocalizationDataList.EN: Why all plumbers hate bricks? That's kind of wierd.

LocalizationDataList.ZH_CN: 不需要的装备可以批量出售掉,又是一笔不小的财富
LocalizationDataList.EN: Sell your redundant gears for Coins.

LocalizationDataList.ZH_CN:
传奇装备有几率获得额外属性，
有时甚至会获得初次升级必出某技能的属性
LocalizationDataList.EN: Legendary gears may have extra attributes, or an attribute that guarantees a certain skill on your first skill selection.

LocalizationDataList.ZH_CN:
史诗装备具有初次升级必出某2级技能的属性,
让你在前期技能就领先别人1级！
LocalizationDataList.EN: Epic gears give you a certain lv.2 skill on your first skill selection, bringing you an early lead in skill level!

LocalizationDataList.ZH_CN: 武器合成时，多余的低级武器可以拖到左下角回收桶卖掉
LocalizationDataList.EN: Drag redundant weapons to the trashcan to sell them.

LocalizationDataList.ZH_CN: 每把枪都有不同的后坐力，巧妙利用后坐力逃生吧
等级提升可领取相关奖励！
LocalizationDataList.EN: Level up to get the rewards!

LocalizationDataList.ZH_CN: TIPS:装备的品质:[color=#ff8956]史诗[/color]>[color=#b883ff]传奇[/color]>[color=#ffd05e]稀有[/color]>[color=#4cc7ff]高级[/color]> [color=#FFFFFF]普通[/color]

LocalizationDataList.EN: Add extra bullets to your magazine
Inflict area damage to the direction you face

LocalizationDataList.ZH_CN: 暂无视频广告,请稍后再试
LocalizationDataList.EN: No ads for the moment, please try again later

LocalizationDataList.ZH_CN: 需要收集"寒冰公主回归啦"
技能【冰球】外观变为【雪球】
装备小刀后，技能【气刃】变为【动感光波】，可发出6连光波
LocalizationDataList.EN: [Turn "Air Blade" into "Light Wave" when using knives]

LocalizationDataList.ZH_CN: 曾经大闹天宫的齐天大圣

增加被动技能【瞬间移动】，可移动到敌人身后
以【海洋屏障】发动招架，格挡60%伤害
技能【光刃】外观变为【光子粉碎】
LocalizationDataList.EN:
Gain the passive skill [Flash]: 
 instantly move to the enemy's backUse 
 [Ocean Shield]  to block 60% damageThe appearance 
 of [Light Blade] changes into [Photon Smash]

LocalizationDataList.ZH_CN: 技能【光刃】外观变为【光子之刃】，还能引发额外爆炸
LocalizationDataList.EN: The appearance of [Light Blade] changes into [Photon Blade] and can make explosion

LocalizationDataList.ZH_CN:
【以气御剪】近战命中敌人有概率发动剪刀攻击
【分手吧，剪刃】近战击中敌人有概率发动双重剪刀攻击
【恢复记忆】装备千刃时进化为【真·刺客柒】,速度增加
【千刃归一】普攻时有几率发动【千刃归一】
LocalizationDataList.EN:
[Flying Scissors] Melee attack may launch a scissors attack
[Double Scissors] Melee attack may launch a double scissors attack
[Sublimation] When equipped with Magic Blade, ascend into [Ulti - Assassin 007]
[A Thousand Blades] Normal attack may trigger [A Thousand Blades]

LocalizationDataList.ZH_CN: 打击场景中的方块有概率掉出能巨大化的蘑菇
LocalizationDataList.EN: Hitting the squares has a chance of getting a dropped Huge Mushrooms

LocalizationDataList.ZH_CN:
击倒后播放庆祝音乐，站在我方的【冰霜光环】上会缓慢回血，
 每秒1%
LocalizationDataList.EN: After the kill, play celebration music, stand on our [Frost Aura] and slowly return blood, 1% per second

LocalizationDataList.ZH_CN: 击倒后,受害者尸体留下白线轮廓
LocalizationDataList.EN: After killing, the victim's body is left with a white outline

LocalizationDataList.ZH_CN:
击倒后，获得【肾上腺素】
增加0.5m/s的移动速度和50%的攻击速度，持续3秒
拥有超高的移速和攻速，快速击败对手

【手枪精通】手枪伤害增加
【手枪大师】手枪伤害增加，手枪装填时间加快
【职业手枪大师】手枪伤害增加,手枪有额外几率一枪双发

【控僵术】用锁链控制住僵尸。最多控制1只僵尸
【控僵大师】僵尸的基础属性提升，最多控制2只僵尸
【职业控僵大师】僵尸的基础属性提升，僵尸每隔一段时间无敌状态。

【15%几率攻击距离暴涨】
【吃鸡有机会获得 刺客柒 碎片】
LocalizationDataList.EN: [Only"the one" can wield the blue blade]

LocalizationDataList.ZH_CN: 【发动“颤栗践踏”时，附带跳劈效果】
LocalizationDataList.EN: [It has a chopping effect once the "Trembling Trample" is activated]

LocalizationDataList.ZH_CN: 【吕布最爱的武器，闪闪发光，需要极大的力量和技巧】
LocalizationDataList.EN: [Lv Bu's favorite weapon, shiny, and requires great strength and skill]

LocalizationDataList.ZH_CN: 【我就是雷神，让我看看谁敢站在我身边找雷劈！】
LocalizationDataList.EN: [I am the God of Thunder, let's see who dares to stand next to me and get struck by lightning!]
【Unleash the screams to frighten the enemy's soul！】
【Adding a poisonous ring to the whirlwind when released】

LocalizationDataList.ZH_CN: 在真正的刺客手上才能砍出蓝色的光芒!！
LocalizationDataList.EN: [Only"the one" can wield the blue blade]

LocalizationDataList.ZH_CN: 使用 战栗践踏 会触发劈砍
LocalizationDataList.EN: [It has a chopping effect once the "Trembling Trample" is activated]
[Lv Bu's favorite weapon, shiny, and requires great strength and skill]
[I am the God of Thunder, let's see who dares to stand next to me and get struck by lightning!]

LocalizationDataList.ZH_CN: 发射烟花，为庆典欢呼吧！
LocalizationDataList.EN: Launch fireworks to cheer for the celebration!
Launch eggs and stink the enemy!

LocalizationDataList.ZH_CN: 立即获得[F1]把 [F2] 级武器
看视频可收集碎片，解锁此皮肤
LocalizationDataList.EN: Watch ads to collect shards and unlock the skin

LocalizationDataList.ZH_CN: 需要集满碎片才能使用
LocalizationDataList.EN: Collect enough shards to use it!

LocalizationDataList.ZH_CN: 活动日期：2021年4月1号到4月18号

需要补充钥匙继续开启
必得最佳大奖!
段位小于钻石即可进入
段位达到白银即可进入
段位达到钻石即可进入
前往指定位置寻找宝藏
LocalizationDataList.EN: 前往指定位置寻找宝藏

LocalizationDataList.ZH_CN: 什么都没挖到，宝藏似乎在[color=#ffa200]上↑[/color]边！
LocalizationDataList.EN: 什么都没挖到，宝藏似乎在[color=#ffa200]上↑[/color]边！

LocalizationDataList.ZH_CN: 什么都没挖到，宝藏似乎在[color=#ffa200]下↓[/color]边！
LocalizationDataList.EN: 什么都没挖到，宝藏似乎在[color=#ffa200]下↓[/color]边！

LocalizationDataList.ZH_CN: 什么都没挖到，宝藏似乎在[color=#ffa200]左←[/color]边！
LocalizationDataList.EN: 什么都没挖到，宝藏似乎在[color=#ffa200]左←[/color]边！

LocalizationDataList.ZH_CN: 什么都没挖到，宝藏似乎在[color=#ffa200]右→[/color]边！
LocalizationDataList.EN: 什么都没挖到，宝藏似乎在[color=#ffa200]右→[/color]边！

LocalizationDataList.ZH_CN: 增加[F1]%移动速度，射击时有[F2]%概率一枪双发
增加[F1]%子弹分裂几率和[F2]%穿透几率
每发子弹有[F1]%几率眩晕目标[F2]ms距离越近伤害越高，根据攻击距离最多能造成[F3]%伤害
随着瞄准过程逐渐增加穿透和伤害，最多增加[F1]%穿透几率和[F2]%伤害，子弹大小也逐渐增加[F3]%
增加[F1]血量上限，并补满血
打光弹药获得[F1]m/s移动速度
每[F1]次连击会召唤一颗大冰雹
目标被消灭时会发出激光
所有特殊效果的触发需求减少[F1]%。
所有特殊效果会额外触发一次。
下次装填有[F1]%几率双倍载弹。
特殊攻击造成的连击数*[F1]
朝瞄准方向[F1]距离处丢一颗手雷
LocalizationDataList.EN: Throw a grenade at a distance of [F1] in the direction of aim

LocalizationDataList.ZH_CN: 释放一个半径为[F1][m]的冰霜
手持一个盾牌，反弹子弹
LocalizationDataList.EN: Holding a shield that bounces off bullets

LocalizationDataList.ZH_CN: 释放一个可穿墙的吸血针

LocalizationDataList.EN: Create a horizontal wall of earth in front of you

LocalizationDataList.ZH_CN: 释放出射线，施法技能(松开则停止）
LocalizationDataList.EN: Release the ray and cast the spell skill (release to stop)

LocalizationDataList.ZH_CN: 以[F1]m/s的速度向前翻滚，过程中无敌
LocalizationDataList.EN: Rolling forward at [F1]m/s, invincible during the course

LocalizationDataList.ZH_CN: 挥枪向前打出一个气刃
LocalizationDataList.EN: Swing your gun forward and strike an air blade

LocalizationDataList.ZH_CN: 释放一个半径为[F1][m]的毒雾
LocalizationDataList.EN: Release a toxic mist with a radius of [F1]

LocalizationDataList.ZH_CN: 解除自身控制并释放半径为[F1][m]的气场
LocalizationDataList.EN: Release its own control and release an aura of radius [F1]

LocalizationDataList.ZH_CN: 释放[F2]个环绕自身的光球
LocalizationDataList.EN: Release [F2] a ball of light around itself

LocalizationDataList.ZH_CN: 增加[F1]%血量上限，并补满血
LocalizationDataList.EN: Increases [F1]% blood limit and replenishes blood

LocalizationDataList.ZH_CN: 打光弹药获得[F1]m/s移动速度
LocalizationDataList.EN: Gain [F1] m/s movement speed by shooting out ammunition

LocalizationDataList.ZH_CN: 跳起并加速[F5]%直至落地猛砸
LocalizationDataList.EN: Jump up and accelerate [F5]% until you land a slam

LocalizationDataList.ZH_CN: 原地释放一个炮台持续[F1]ms
LocalizationDataList.EN: Releasing a turret in place lasts [F1]ms

LocalizationDataList.ZH_CN: 预警[F1]ms后，对周围[F2]码发动范围攻击，伤害为[F3]
预警[F1]ms后，对前方[F2]码内的[F3]°扇形区域发动范围攻击，伤害为[F4]
暴怒动作并预警[F1]ms后，对前方[F2]码内宽度为[F3]的直线区域发动喷火攻击，并以[F4]°每秒的速度随机顺逆时针转头，持续[F5]ms，伤害为每秒[F6]

持续施法技能（松开则停止），从头顶释放出长度为[F1]的射线，使触碰到的敌人的移动速度减低[F2]%，并造成每秒[F3]%技能伤害。
转动摇杆可以控制光刃旋转，最大角度为每秒[F6]°。
光子之刃最少持续[F4]ms,最长持续[F5]ms。

预警[F5]ms后，以[F1]m/s的速度向前冲刺[keepTime]ms，冲刺时对触碰到的敌人造成[F2]%武器伤害。（武器伤害=角色的单次攻击伤害）
对被击中的敌人硬直[F3]ms，击退[F4]m
预警[F4]ms后，对命中的敌人造成[F1]%技能伤害，并将敌人勾过来并眩晕[F2]ms，长度[F3]码

尸巢数量已达上限([F1]/[F1])
难度即将提升，请尽快前往【摧毁尸巢】
LocalizationDataList.EN:
尸巢数量已达上限([F1]/[F1])
难度即将提升，请尽快前往【摧毁尸巢】

LocalizationDataList.ZH_CN: 春节活动，签到七日可领取新英雄—小王子
LocalizationDataList.EN: Spring Festival Event, Sign in for 7 Days to Receive a New Hero - The Little Prince
